author: cms-sw
body: For Devel IBS we are proposing to disable the gcc4 compatible ABI i.e. start using the new C++11 ABI. Once this goes fine then we should get this in for normal IBS too. This also need https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22213 PR
title: remove gcc4-compatible flag i.e. move back to new ABI
